auth.registerDescription: Enter your details and create a passkey
auth.registerSuccess: Account created successfully! Your passkey has been saved in your browser.
auth.magicLinkSent: Magic link sent! Check your email.
auth.passkeyHint: Optional: enter your email to find your passkey faster
auth.passkeyLoginHint: Use your saved passkey to login
auth.magicLinkHint: We'll send you a magic link to login. After login you can save a passkey.

errors.CONNECTION_LIMIT_REACHED: You have reached the maximum limit of 50 connections
errors.RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Too many requests, please try again later
errors.TOKEN_COLLISION: Token generation error. Please try again.
errors.WEBAUTHN_NOT_SUPPORTED: Your browser does not support passkeys
errors.EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: An account with this email already exists. Please login instead.
errors.MAGIC_LINK_NOT_CONFIGURED: Magic link not configured. Please configure EMAIL_SERVER to use this feature.
